patthana14.28:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
patthana14.28:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
patthana14.28:2.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
